response.overview: The 2025 Heatwave is an upcoming professional wrestling livestreaming event produced by WWE. It will be the fourth annual Heatwave produced by the company for its developmental brand NXT, and 11th Heatwave overall. The event will take place on Sunday, August 24, 2025, at the Lowell Memorial Auditorium in Lowell, Massachusetts, and will be the first Heatwave to solely use the WWE logo as well as be broadcast on Netflix.
response.title: NXT Heatwave 2025
